Sentencas: NiO-Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 (YSZ) composite is the state-of-the-art material for the anode support of planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: LaNbO4 toughened NiO-Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 composite for the anode support of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To improve its fracture toughness (K-C), lanthanum orthoniobate LaNbO4 is synthesized by the method of solid state reaction and added to the mixture of YSZ and NiO at the weight ratio of 47:53.
Titulo: LaNbO4 toughened NiO-Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 composite for the anode support of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The content of LaNbO4 in the composite is in the range between 5 and 30 wt%.
Titulo: LaNbO4 toughened NiO-Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 composite for the anode support of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The microstructure of the composites is examined by scanning electron microscopy (SEM); and the chemical compatibility among the components is evaluated by X-ray diffraction (XRD) and energy dispersive X-ray spectroscopy (EDS).
Titulo: LaNbO4 toughened NiO-Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 composite for the anode support of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Vickers hardness test is performed for estimating the K-C of the composites.
Titulo: LaNbO4 toughened NiO-Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 composite for the anode support of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results indicate that the K-C increases with the addition of LaNbO4 in the composites; and the toughening effect is associated with the grain-refinement in the composite and the domain switch in the monoclinic LaNbO4.
Titulo: LaNbO4 toughened NiO-Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 composite for the anode support of planar solid oxide fuel cells
